mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xxl_mq_message_archive ( `topic`, `partition_id`, `data`, `biz_id`, `status`, `effect_time`, `consume_log`, `consume_instance_uuid`, `add_time`, `update_time` ) VALUES( #{messageArchive.topic} , #{messageArchive.partitionId} , #{messageArchive.data} , #{messageArchive.bizId} , #{messageArchive.status} , #{messageArchive.effectTime} , #{messageArchive.consumeLog} , #{messageArchive.consumeInstanceUuid} , NOW() , NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.`add_time`,'%Y-%m-%d') produceDay, SUM(CASE WHEN t.`status` = 0 then 1 else 0 end) as newCount, SUM(CASE WHEN t.`status` = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as runningCount, SUM(CASE WHEN t.`status` = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as sucCount, SUM(CASE WHEN t.`status` in (3, 4) then 1 else 0 end) as failCount FROM xxl_mq_message_archive AS t WHERE t.`add_time` BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY produceDay ORDER BY produceDay
